description: Try our easy to follow Milo BBQ Hot Cross Bun Ice Cream Sandwich recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Ice-cream sandwich,Seafood free,Sesame free,Easter leftovers,Easter,Quick & easy dessert
name: Milo BBQ Hot Cross Bun Ice Cream Sandwich Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat barbecue flat plate on medium heat. Place hot cross bun halves cut side down on flat plate and cook for 3-4 minutes or until toasted. Transfer to a serving plate.

Place Milo in a medium mixing bowl. Transfer 1 scoop of the ice-cream to the bowl, then turn the bowl in a circular motion until ice-cream is coated in Milo. Transfer to a serving plate and repeat with remaining ice-cream scoop.
Place coated ice-cream scoops between toasted hot cross buns and serve immediately.
